Author: FairWin.Tech
Title: [ANN] [Pre-Sale] FairWin - Innovative Gambling on blockchain
Body: UPDATE (09.08.18): The FairWin platform alpha is live!  Hello, friends of FairWin! We released the alpha-version of the FairWin gaming platform on the Ethereum blockchain on the 8th of August. It is available here: http://showcase.fairwin.io. At the moment, only one game is available in the Ethereum test network, Rinkeby, - it's Yggdrasil, a slot game about the magic Scandinavian tree. It only takes a Metamask account and some amount of test Ether to deposit test FWIN tokens on the game account and start playing.  Our platform works in the test mode now. So if you detect any bugs or experience any problems when playing the game, feel free to write about it in the Discord test chat (https://discord.gg/wsUd6U).  We welcome any kind of feedback!  Over the next few weeks we are going to launch the games with the real FWIN tokens. Right now you have a chance to buy tokens at a huge discount with the help of this smart-contract: 0x4654a62C8D45201542E86233b625A4e33ECb316b.  Follow the FairWin news!

Author: FairWin.Tech
Title: [ANN] [Pre-Sale] FairWin - Innovative Gambling on blockchain
Body: UPDATE (11.10.18): Four new games are live on the FairWin game platform!  Today we have launched four new classic 3x5 slots on the FairWin blockchain platform: the Magic Illusions slot about a magic show; Ocean Realm - a slot about fantastic sea inhabitants; Stone Tribe about prehistoric times and Kyoto Spirit - a game inspired by the Japanese culture.  All these games are available to play with test FWIN tokens in the Showcase section of the official FairWin site (http://showcase.fairwin.io/#/).  Read more information about the games here: https://fairwin.io/news.html  If you find any bugs in the games or want to leave feedback or have any questions, write to us in the FairWin Telegram group (https://t.me/fair_win) or in the Discord test chat (https://discord.gg/wsUd6U).  Follow the FairWin news!

Author: FairWin.Tech
Title: [ANN] [Pre-Sale] FairWin - Innovative Gambling on blockchain
Body: UPDATE (29.10.18): The original slot Top Drop is live on the FairWin platform  The FairWin team has launched their second original slot Top Drop on the game platform on the Ethereum blockchain. The demo is available in the Showcase section of the official site. It can be played with test FWIN tokens.  The plot of Top Drop is set in Colombia. The player fills the shoes of a smuggler and has to fuel and load his plane with “goods” and then drop the cargoes. There are three phases at each game level. In the first phase, the player has to collect the Fuel symbols on the reels to tank up the plane, in the second phase he needs to load the plane with goods and then drop them from above. The third phase is an escape from a police chase, where the task is to fill the Gun bar. At the end of every level the player has an opportunity to get a new car, which will allow him to receive winnings with a multiplier at the next level.  You can see all this and even more with your own eyes - play Top Drop right now.  If you find a bug or want to tell us your remarks or suggestions about the game, write to us in our Discord chat or Telegram group. Play Top Drop and enjoy the fair game on the FairWin platform!  Follow the FairWin news!

Author: FairWin.Tech
Title: [ANN] [Pre-Sale] FairWin - Innovative Gambling on blockchain
Body: UPDATE (22.11.18): FairWin token sale will start in December, 2018  The FairWin TGE will take place from December 1, 2018 to January 1, 2019. The FWIN tokens will be sold at the price of 1000 FWIN = 1 USD.  The FWIN tokens will be used in all games on the FairWin gaming platform. Unlike in other blockchain casinos, all game transactions on the FairWin platform will be fast thanks to FairChannel, a data transfer channel within which an RNG operates and all game turns are performed. So, players will need to make only two on-chain transactions - when they deposit and withdraw the coins.  Our team has already launched the prototype of the game platform, which is available in the Showcase section of the official FairWin site. At the moment, there are 8 games available, including 6 classic slots and two original FairWin games: Yggdrasil about the magic tree from Norse mythology and Top Drop, devoted to smugglers in Colombia. The possibilities of our blockchain platform can be demonstrated in these games, which you can play with test FWIN tokens.  A few more games for the FairWin platform are under development now: the game Blobsters about cute monsters, Voyagers - about travels and geographical discoveries, the original slot Zethereum Catz about space cats travelling through galaxies in search of Zethereum, and a game dedicated to magic.  Taking part in our token sale requires no KYC. The details about using tokens on the FairWin platform and listings on crypto-exchanges will be reported later.  Follow the FairWin news!

Author: FairWin.Tech
Title: [ANN] [Pre-Sale] FairWin - Innovative Gambling on blockchain
Body: UPDATE (28.12.18):  The FairWin project was launched in January 2018 by a team of experienced developers and designers. Since the start of the project, we have managed to launch a working prototype of a gaming platform on the Ethereum blockchain with 8 slot games, including 6 classic slots and two original games - Yggdrasil and Top Drop. All games can be tested on the FairWin gaming platform on the project's official website.  At the end of November, we decided to start a token sale from December 1, 2018 to be concluded on January 1, 2019. At the end of this month we sadly announce that we have not been able to collect the necessary amount to continue working on the project. In this regard, we announce that this work is over. We thank the participants of the Bounty campaign and everyone who supported us.  All participants of the second stage of the Bounty will receive their tokens after January 1 in any case. We do not exclude the possibility that some time later we will resume the development of this project and the FWIN token will be listed on cryptocurrency exchanges. But we can not give any guarantees for the near future.  Thank you for being with us. FairWin team

Author: FairWin.Tech
Title: [ANN] [Pre-Sale] FairWin - Innovative Gambling on blockchain
Body: https://i.imgur.com/GGTRFMe.jpg  FairWin - Decentralised gambling platform on the Ethereum blockchain  WEBSITE | WHITE PAPER | TOKEN SALE | ROADMAP | TEAM  SOCIAL MEDIA  FACEBOOK | TWITTER | LINKEDIN | INSTAGRAM | GOOGLE+ | YOUTUBE | REDDIT | GITHUB  CONTACT US  TELEGRAM | DISCORD   ANN THREADS Russian ANN Indonesian ANN Chinese ANN Turkish ANN German ANN Italian ANN Spanish ANN Philippines ANN Francais ANN Portuguese ANN Korean ANN  BOUNTY THREADS English (main thread) Russian Indonesian Chinese Turkish German Italian Spanish Philippines Francais Portuguese Korean   Probably all people who are interested in cryptocurrency or gambling believe that the blockchain technology is the future of the online casino industry. The Blockchain technology is capable of making online gambling open and fair.  The FairWin company has decided not to stop there and make their game platform on the Ethereum blockchain even better…  Faster  The main problem of the majority of existing platforms on the Ethereum blockchain is that they are insufficiently fast. Every bet is recorded in the blockchain system and players have to wait a few seconds and even minutes for every transaction and every bet. The game loses the lion’s share of its charm. That is why the FairWin team has developed FairChannel. Now you only have to make two transactions on-chain — when you begin the game and receive tokens and when you leave the game and withdraw your tokens. This way game speed is accelerated.  Brighter   FairWin is not simply a fair game platform on the Ethereum blockchain, it stands for bright and memorable games with magnificent graphics. A whole team of designers works on the visual aspect of the FairWin games. Even people who are not interested in gambling will not be left indifferent. At least, we hope so.  More ambitious  Since 2008 our team has been engaged in online casino games development. If our technology gains recognition in the course of our ICO, we plan to develop games on the Ethereum Blockchain as we consider that the future of the gambling industry belongs to it. We understand that the ICO is only the first step in the development of our company and it is an opportunity to gain acceptance on the international level. We hope that it will give us a powerful impulse for development.  More humane   Working in the gambling industry we realize that it has negative consequences. In many countries of the world casino activity is illegal. However, we do not consider that the ban on gambling is capable to solve the gambling problem. With the development of online casinos it became even more accessible — now it is possible to play in a casino without leaving your house. Therefore it is much more important to make gambling safer for players and to soften negative consequences of gambling. The blockchain technology minimizes the risk of swindle by game organizers and makes casinos safer. We hope to attract attention to our project and change the gambling industry. Author: FairWin.Tech
Title: [ANN] [Pre-Sale] FairWin - Innovative Gambling on blockchain
Body: UPDATE (29.06.18): FairWin is beginning the first stage of its token sale!  An important announcement for all who follow the fate of our project:  We are postponing the ICO indefinitely due to the need to optimize our product. Also, we are starting an open-ended pre-sale. Our team continues developing a game platform and games on blockchain. The FWIN tokens will be used for placing bets in the games by FairWin.  The first stage of the pre-sale will take place from July, 7th till August, 7th, during which the tokens will be on sale at a discount (3000 FWIN = 1 USD). To participate in the pre-sale, it is necessary to fill in the registration form and leave a request for some amount of tokens. After August, 7th we will release tokens to be distributed among the participants of the first stage of the pre-sale and the Bounty campaign.  The pre-sale details and the instruction on buying tokens on our site will be published later. Follow the FairWin news. The Bounty program will go on after August, 7th.

Author: FairWin.Tech
Title: [ANN] [Pre-Sale] FairWin - Innovative Gambling on blockchain
Body: UPDATE (02.08.18): Only 5 days left until the end of the first stage of the FWIN token sale  The first stage of the pre-sale runs from July, 7th till August, 7th. Before its first stage ends, you can buy the FWIN tokens at the rate 1 ETH = 423 USD = 1 290 000 FWIN without any registration or KYC.  The smart-contract address for purchasing the FWIN tokens: 0x4654a62C8D45201542E86233b625A4e33ECb316b  Buying tokens is easy with MetaMask:  Access your wallet. Press the Send button. Insert the smart-contract address (0x4654a62C8D45201542E86233b625A4e33ECb316b) in the Recipient address field. In the field below, specify the amount of Ether you’d like to spend on the purchase of the FWIN tokens. Press the Next button. Confirm the transaction. Wait for the transaction to be confirmed and the tokens to appear on your account.  Viola!  The FWIN tokens will be used for placing bets in all games by FairWin. Now we are preparing to release the alpha version of the FairWin gaming platform. The game lobby will appear on our site in the Showcase section in the next few weeks.  Follow the FairWin news!
